attributes.action: Revoke british citizenship of ALL those who left the UK to be with isis
attributes.additional_details:
...These same extremist people now defeated, wish to return to the UK. To live amongst our families and friends. The same extremists who stood by watching executions and acts of terror committed. 

These people should not be prosecuted under UK law, they should have all citizenship revoked, and be tried in Syrian and or Iraqi courts.
attributes.background: There are many now wanting to return to the UK from isis territories, having fought for isis, support isis, or be married to isis fighters. It is well documented and unequivocally proven the horrors inflicted by ISIS on all communities and wider populace of different culture, religion or belief...
